General.Name: Pittler Maschinenfabrik AG
General.Description: Pittler Maschinenfabrik AG, together with its subsidiaries, develops, produces, and sells precision tools in Germany and internationally. It also manufactures and sells clamping devices and clamping systems for various industries. Pittler Maschinenfabrik AG was founded in 1889 and is based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.

0.Name: Senator Günter  Rothenberger
0.Title: MD & Member of the Supervisory Board
